jd: From: Parimala, Tetrahed parimala@tetrahed.com Reply to: parimala@tetrahed.com Hi Hope you are doing good Scrum Master/PM Location: REMOTEPay Rate: Open to W2 and C2C options.Position Type: Multiyear Contract Requirements· Within IAM Security Projects, specifically related to CyberArk, work closely with the Product Owner to prioritize and lead delivery of new and existing solutions that align with business initiatives and corporate strategies· Participate as Scrum Master for an assigned Product Team. Will be assigned Products by the Technical Owner and oversee projects ranging from low to high complexity.· Managing a continuous workflow of team deliverables. Advocate, adopt and coach Product Team on Lean, Agile and Scrum practices.
